text: Miguel Hernandez (born September 21, 1974 in Chicago, Illinois) is an American boxer. ==Professional career== Known as "Macho", Miguel began his professional career in 2003. When he stepped up in competition, he lost both fights: to Raúl Márquez and to Luis Ramon Campas in 2006. He won two titles, the WBC USNBC title and the Illinois state title. He is currently beginning his career as a boxing trainer. ==External links== * ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Boxers from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Living people Category:The Contender (TV series) participants Category:American male boxers
title: Miguel Hernandez (boxer)
